item.title: Anyone else here like to rap?
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:12, topic:406263”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=503261.msg3681718#msg3681718 date=1311569053]

I hate niggers.

I hate racism.
Although I’m not black I hope you die :3.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6bMLrA_0O5I

Considering peoples of African decent have a notorious track record for less than desirable behaviors and a lack of overall societal contributions, I see no reason why one would have any sympathy for their kind.

Furthermore, nice cancer.
[/quote]
African’s had a different environment to what westerners had, they had a harsh climate and survived. Just because there strength’s lie in physical attributes does not mean you may be a racist fuck head?

According to your argument I should not like you if your white. I’m Pakistani and we are thought of to have a higher intelligence in general (second behind Chinese people) than white people and generally weaker physical attributes than white people. Similar situation to what your in with Africans actually.

The difference between every other race than white people is white (not including quite a few European countries) have STOLEN from other races through brute force. America is a stolen land, Australia is a stolen land, a lot of tecnologies are stolen even people were taken from there homes to serve Americans (and a few British but this was deeply frowned upon).
I can instantly tell you will bring terrorism into this but many countries TERRORISE people in other countries and terrorism is done by silly groups that think there bigmen so I had decided this cancels each other out. There are so many things I can point out to you(don’t get the wrong impression, I love living in Britain and am culturally more British than Pakistani but I will not turn a shy eye to what happens outside of Britain like most others do).
You have NO right to be a snob, if anything I should be a snob to you. Your parents have raised a piece of FILTH.

Sorry about the cluttered hate reply, I had so much I wanted to put into it so at points it wont make sense I’m guessing and I cba editing it cause I’ll just add more and more…[/quote]
Preserved.

I think you’re mistaking me for a typical hick who dislikes other cultures purely on their physical characteristics. Also, Pakistan is not a terrorist state - that’s pretty obvious; I don’t know what terrorism even has to do with this argument.

Read full topic

[/quote]
That’s what I think when I heard a good rap song, I get all amped up and then I’m like, “damn it I’m white”.[/quote]
I’m Asian and I blast rap when I’m driving. No ‘damns’ …

item.title: Anyone else here like to rap?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:10, topic:406263”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=503261.msg3681705#msg3681705 date=1311567941]

I hate niggers.

I hate racism.
Although I’m not black I hope you die :3.


[/quote]
Considering peoples of African decent have a notorious track record for less than desirable behaviors and a lack of overall societal contributions, I see no reason why one would have any sympathy for their kind.

Furthermore, nice cancer.[/quote]
African’s had a different environment to what westerners had, they had a harsh climate and survived. Just because there strength’s lie in physical attributes does not mean you may be a racist fuck head?

According to your argument I should not like you if your white. I’m Pakistani and we are thought of to have a higher intelligence in general (second behind Chinese people) than white people and generally weaker physical attributes than white people. Similar situation to what your in with Africans actually.

The difference between every other race than white people is white (not including quite a few European countries) have STOLEN from other races through brute force. America is a stolen land, Australia is a stolen land, a lot of tecnologies are stolen even people were taken from there homes to serve Americans (and a few British but this was deeply frowned upon).
I can instantly tell you will bring terrorism into this but many countries TERRORISE people in other countries and terrorism is done by silly groups that think there bigmen so I had decided this cancels each other out. There are so many things I can point out to you(don’t get the wrong impression, I love living in Britain and am culturally more British than Pakistani but I will not turn a shy eye to what happens outside of Britain like most others do).
You have NO right to be a snob, if anything I should be a snob to you. Your parents have raised a piece of FILTH.

Sorry about the cluttered hate reply, I had so much I wanted to put into it so at points it wont make sense I’m guessing and I cba editing it cause I’ll just add more and more…
